subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|手|alt1=扌|t1=hand|支|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – skill with one’s hands.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[skill]]; [[ability]]; [[talent]]; [[artistry]]; [[technique]]
# [[ingenuity]]; [[creativity]]; [[inventiveness]]
# {{†}} [[singing]] and [[dancing]], or one who is skilled in singing and dancing; [[actor]] or [[actress]]
# {{†}} [[craftsman]]; [[artisan]]
